toast.magic_link_sent: Magic link sent to {email}. Check your inbox!
toast.magic_link_failed: Failed to send magic link. Please try again.
toast.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
toast.password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
toast.resend_email_not_found: Email not found. Please start over.
toast.email_required_for_signin: Email is required to complete sign-in.
toast.social_signin_failed: Social sign-in failed. Please try again.
toast.social_signin_failed_provider: Sign-in with {provider} failed. Please try again.
toast.account_exists: An account with this email already exists with a different sign-in method.
toast.auth_api_key_invalid: Firebase API key is invalid. Please check your Firebase configuration.
toast.network_error: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
toast.social_provider_not_configured: {provider} sign-in is not properly configured. Please contact support.
toast.unauthorized_domain: This domain is not authorized for Firebase authentication.
toast.provider_not_enabled: {provider} sign-in is not enabled. Please contact support.
toast.email_already_in_use: An account with this email already exists. Please sign in instead.
toast.weak_password: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password (at least 6 characters with a mix of letters and numbers).
toast.email_signup_not_enabled: Email/password sign-up is not enabled. Please contact support.
toast.too_many_requests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
toast.config_error: Firebase configuration error. Please contact support.
toast.user_not_found: No account found with this email. Please sign up first.
toast.account_disabled: This account has been disabled. Please contact support.
toast.pro_coming_soon: Pro subscription is coming soon! Stay tuned for unlimited tracking and priority support.

auth.promo_desc: Join Vcanship to access exclusive rates, real-time tracking, and a seamless shipping experience from start to finish.

auth.desc_signin: Enter your password to sign in.
auth.magic_link_instead: Email me a magic link instead
auth.magic_link_signup: Sign up with a magic link instead

auth.desc_magic_link_sent_html: We've sent a secure sign-in link to . Click the link to log in.
auth.desc_reset_password: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.

prelaunch.title: Coming Soon!
prelaunch.desc: This feature is currently in development and will be launching soon. Stay tuned!

usage_limit.guest_desc: You've reached the guest lookup limit. Sign in to get more tracking lookups.
usage_limit.free_desc: You've used all your free lookups this month. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited tracking and real-time rates.

landing.hero_subtitle: Your one-stop platform for global logistics—parcel, freight, bulk, and more.
landing.services_subtitle: From parcels to full containers, we've got you covered.
landing.ecommerce_subtitle: Advertise your products across Amazon, eBay, TikTok, and 7+ more platforms with one listing.
landing.why_us_subtitle: We're not just a platform; we're your logistics partner.
landing.why_us_feature1_desc: Compare quotes from top carriers in real-time and save up to 70%.
landing.why_us_feature2_desc: Access a vast network of carriers and partners covering over 220 countries and territories.
landing.why_us_feature3_desc: Get AI-powered quotes in seconds with transparent pricing and no hidden fees.
landing.why_us_feature4_desc: Real-time tracking and notifications keep you informed every step of the way.
landing.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of businesses shipping smarter with Vcanship.
